title: Misty Step
content:
Misty Step Level 2 Conjuration Spell Surrounded by silver mist, you teleport to an unoccupied space you can see. 18m Bonus ActionLevel 2 Spell Slot

Level 2 Conjuration Spell

Surrounded by silver mist, you teleport to an unoccupied space you can see.

Misty Step is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Misty Step is a Level 2 Spell from the Conjuration school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

Baldur's Gate 3 Mist
